definitions: a tropical or subtropical plant belonging to a diverse genus native to Africa and southern Asia.

notes.text: Genus Moringa, family Moringaceae: several species inluding the drumstick tree Moringa oleifera

definitions: a preparation of the leaves, fruits, or other parts of the drumstick tree, used chiefly as an herbal or dietary supplement

examples.text: moringa contains very high levels of antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds

shortDefinitions: preparation of leaves etc. of drumstick tree
